tool.name: GFF3 to GBK
tool.help:
**WARNING**
This is a LOSSY conversion. This tool **TRUNCATES** genbank file identifiers if they are too long. Your data may not "match up" after processing through this ool.
**What it does**:
Convert gff3 data to genbank. There are may WebApollo specific conventions. A re-numbering is also done.
